00037  * file in each example directory ("lpc17xx_libcfg.h") must be included,
00038  * otherwise the default FW library configuration file must be included instead
00039  */

00049 /* Public Functions ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00053 static void setSSPclock (LPC_SSP_TypeDef *SSPx, uint32_t target_clock);
00054 
00055 /*********************************************************************/
00063 static void setSSPclock (LPC_SSP_TypeDef *SSPx, uint32_t target_clock)
00064 {
00065     uint32_t prescale, cr0_div, cmp_clk, ssp_clk;
00066 
00067     CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSPx(SSPx));
00068 
00069     /* The SSP clock is derived from the (main system oscillator / 2),
00070        so compute the best divider from that clock */
00071     if (SSPx == LPC_SSP0){
00072         ssp_clk = CLKPWR_GetPCLK (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_SSP0);
00073     } else if (SSPx == LPC_SSP1) {
00074         ssp_clk = CLKPWR_GetPCLK (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_SSP1);
00075     } else {
00076         return;
00077     }
00078 
00079         /* Find closest divider to get at or under the target frequency.
00080            Use smallest prescale possible and rely on the divider to get
00081            the closest target frequency */
00082         cr0_div = 0;
00083         cmp_clk = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00084         prescale = 2;
00085         while (cmp_clk > target_clock)
00086         {
00087                 cmp_clk = ssp_clk / ((cr0_div + 1) * prescale);
00088                 if (cmp_clk > target_clock)
00089                 {
00090                         cr0_div++;
00091                         if (cr0_div > 0xFF)
00092                         {
00093                                 cr0_div = 0;
00094                                 prescale += 2;
00095                         }
00096                 }
00097         }
00098 
00099     /* Write computed prescaler and divider back to register */
00100     SSPx->CR0 &= (~SSP_CR0_SCR(0xFF)) & SSP_CR0_BITMASK;
00101     SSPx->CR0 |= (SSP_CR0_SCR(cr0_div)) & SSP_CR0_BITMASK;
00102     SSPx->CPSR = prescale & SSP_CPSR_BITMASK;
00103 }
00104 
00109 /* Public Functions ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00114 /********************************************************************/
00125 void SSP_Init(LPC_SSP_TypeDef *SSPx, SSP_CFG_Type *SSP_ConfigStruct)
00126 {
00127         uint32_t tmp;
00128 
00129         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSPx(SSPx));
00130 
00131         if(SSPx == LPC_SSP0) {
00132                 /* Set up clock and power for SSP0 module */
00133                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCSSP0, ENABLE);
00134         } else if(SSPx == LPC_SSP1) {
00135                 /* Set up clock and power for SSP1 module */
00136                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCSSP1, ENABLE);
00137         } else {
00138                 return;
00139         }
00140 
00141         /* Configure SSP, interrupt is disable, LoopBack mode is disable,
00142          * SSP is disable, Slave output is disable as default
00143          */
00144         tmp = ((SSP_ConfigStruct->CPHA) | (SSP_ConfigStruct->CPOL) \
00145                 | (SSP_ConfigStruct->FrameFormat) | (SSP_ConfigStruct->Databit))
00146                 & SSP_CR0_BITMASK;
00147         // write back to SSP control register
00148         SSPx->CR0 = tmp;
00149 
00150         tmp = SSP_ConfigStruct->Mode & SSP_CR1_BITMASK;
00151         // Write back to CR1
00152         SSPx->CR1 = tmp;
00153 
00154         // Set clock rate for SSP peripheral
00155         setSSPclock(SSPx, SSP_ConfigStruct->ClockRate);
00156 }
00157 
00158 /*********************************************************************/
00166 void SSP_DeInit(LPC_SSP_TypeDef* SSPx)
00167 {
00168         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSPx(SSPx));
00169 
00170         if (SSPx == LPC_SSP0){
00171                 /* Set up clock and power for SSP0 module */
00172                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCSSP0, DISABLE);
00173         } else if (SSPx == LPC_SSP1) {
00174                 /* Set up clock and power for SSP1 module */
00175                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCSSP1, DISABLE);
00176         }
00177 }

00179 /*****************************************************************************/
00190 uint8_t SSP_GetDataSize(LPC_SSP_TypeDef* SSPx)
00191 {
00192         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSPx(SSPx));
00193         return (SSPx->CR0 & (0xF));
00194 }
00195 
00196 /*****************************************************************************/
00208 void SSP_ConfigStructInit(SSP_CFG_Type *SSP_InitStruct)
00209 {
00210         SSP_InitStruct->CPHA = SSP_CPHA_FIRST;
00211         SSP_InitStruct->CPOL = SSP_CPOL_HI;
00212         SSP_InitStruct->ClockRate = 1000000;
00213         SSP_InitStruct->Databit = SSP_DATABIT_8;
00214         SSP_InitStruct->Mode = SSP_MASTER_MODE;
00215         SSP_InitStruct->FrameFormat = SSP_FRAME_SPI;
00216 }

00219 /*********************************************************************/
00227 void SSP_Cmd(LPC_SSP_TypeDef* SSPx, FunctionalState NewState)
00228 {
00229         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSPx(SSPx));
00230         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
00231 
00232         if (NewState == ENABLE)
00233         {
00234                 SSPx->CR1 |= SSP_CR1_SSP_EN;
00235         }
00236         else
00237         {
00238                 SSPx->CR1 &= (~SSP_CR1_SSP_EN) & SSP_CR1_BITMASK;
00239         }
00240 }
00241 
00242 /*********************************************************************/
00252 void SSP_LoopBackCmd(LPC_SSP_TypeDef* SSPx, FunctionalState NewState)
00253 {
00254         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSPx(SSPx));
00255         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
00256 
00257         if (NewState == ENABLE)
00258         {
00259                 SSPx->CR1 |= SSP_CR1_LBM_EN;
00260         }
00261         else
00262         {
00263                 SSPx->CR1 &= (~SSP_CR1_LBM_EN) & SSP_CR1_BITMASK;
00264         }
00265 }

00267 /*********************************************************************/
00280 void SSP_SlaveOutputCmd(LPC_SSP_TypeDef* SSPx, FunctionalState NewState)
00281 {
00282         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSPx(SSPx));
00283         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
00284 
00285         if (NewState == ENABLE)
00286         {
00287                 SSPx->CR1 &= (~SSP_CR1_SO_DISABLE) & SSP_CR1_BITMASK;
00288         }
00289         else
00290         {
00291                 SSPx->CR1 |= SSP_CR1_SO_DISABLE;
00292         }
00293 }

00306 void SSP_SendData(LPC_SSP_TypeDef* SSPx, uint16_t Data)
00307 {
00308         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSPx(SSPx));
00309 
00310         SSPx->DR = SSP_DR_BITMASK(Data);
00311 }

00315 /*********************************************************************/
00322 uint16_t SSP_ReceiveData(LPC_SSP_TypeDef* SSPx)
00323 {
00324         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSPx(SSPx));
00325 
00326         return ((uint16_t) (SSP_DR_BITMASK(SSPx->DR)));
00327 }

00329 /*********************************************************************/
00345 int32_t SSP_ReadWrite (LPC_SSP_TypeDef *SSPx, SSP_DATA_SETUP_Type *dataCfg, \
00346                                                 SSP_TRANSFER_Type xfType)
00347 {
00348         uint8_t *rdata8;
00349     uint8_t *wdata8;
00350         uint16_t *rdata16;
00351     uint16_t *wdata16;
00352     uint32_t stat;
00353     uint32_t tmp;
00354     int32_t dataword;
00355 
00356     dataCfg->rx_cnt = 0;
00357     dataCfg->tx_cnt = 0;
00358     dataCfg->status = 0;
00359 
00360 
00361         /* Clear all remaining data in RX FIFO */
00362         while (SSPx->SR & SSP_SR_RNE){
00363                 tmp = (uint32_t) SSP_ReceiveData(SSPx);
00364         }
00365 
00366         // Clear status
00367         SSPx->ICR = SSP_ICR_BITMASK;
00368         if(SSP_GetDataSize(SSPx)>8)
00369                 dataword = 1;
00370         else dataword = 0;
00371 
00372         // Polling mode ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00373         if (xfType == SSP_TRANSFER_POLLING){
00374                 if (dataword == 0){
00375                         rdata8 = (uint8_t *)dataCfg->rx_data;
00376                         wdata8 = (uint8_t *)dataCfg->tx_data;
00377                 } else {
00378                         rdata16 = (uint16_t *)dataCfg->rx_data;
00379                         wdata16 = (uint16_t *)dataCfg->tx_data;
00380                 }
00381                 while ((dataCfg->tx_cnt != dataCfg->length) || (dataCfg->rx_cnt != dataCfg->length)){
00382                         if ((SSPx->SR & SSP_SR_TNF) && (dataCfg->tx_cnt != dataCfg->length)){
00383                                 // Write data to buffer
00384                                 if(dataCfg->tx_data == NULL){
00385                                         if (dataword == 0){
00386                                                 SSP_SendData(SSPx, 0xFF);
00387                                                 dataCfg->tx_cnt++;
00388                                         } else {
00389                                                 SSP_SendData(SSPx, 0xFFFF);
00390                                                 dataCfg->tx_cnt += 2;
00391                                         }
00392                                 } else {
00393                                         if (dataword == 0){
00394                                                 SSP_SendData(SSPx, *wdata8);
00395                                                 wdata8++;
00396                                                 dataCfg->tx_cnt++;
00397                                         } else {
00398                                                 SSP_SendData(SSPx, *wdata16);
00399                                                 wdata16++;
00400                                                 dataCfg->tx_cnt += 2;
00401                                         }
00402                                 }
00403                         }
00404 
00405                         // Check overrun error
00406                         if ((stat = SSPx->RIS) & SSP_RIS_ROR){
00407                                 // save status and return
00408                                 dataCfg->status = stat | SSP_STAT_ERROR;
00409                                 return (-1);
00410                         }
00411 
00412                         // Check for any data available in RX FIFO
00413                         while ((SSPx->SR & SSP_SR_RNE) && (dataCfg->rx_cnt != dataCfg->length)){
00414                                 // Read data from SSP data
00415                                 tmp = SSP_ReceiveData(SSPx);
00416 
00417                                 // Store data to destination
00418                                 if (dataCfg->rx_data != NULL)
00419                                 {
00420                                         if (dataword == 0){
00421                                                 *(rdata8) = (uint8_t) tmp;
00422                                                 rdata8++;
00423                                         } else {
00424                                                 *(rdata16) = (uint16_t) tmp;
00425                                                 rdata16++;
00426                                         }
00427                                 }
00428                                 // Increase counter
00429                                 if (dataword == 0){
00430                                         dataCfg->rx_cnt++;
00431                                 } else {
00432                                         dataCfg->rx_cnt += 2;
00433                                 }
00434                         }
00435                 }
00436 
00437                 // save status
00438                 dataCfg->status = SSP_STAT_DONE;
00439 
00440                 if (dataCfg->tx_data != NULL){
00441                         return dataCfg->tx_cnt;
00442                 } else if (dataCfg->rx_data != NULL){
00443                         return dataCfg->rx_cnt;
00444                 } else {
00445                         return (0);
00446                 }
00447         }
00448 
00449         // Interrupt mode ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00450         else if (xfType == SSP_TRANSFER_INTERRUPT){
00451 
00452                 while ((SSPx->SR & SSP_SR_TNF) && (dataCfg->tx_cnt != dataCfg->length)){
00453                         // Write data to buffer
00454                         if(dataCfg->tx_data == NULL){
00455                                 if (dataword == 0){
00456                                         SSP_SendData(SSPx, 0xFF);
00457                                         dataCfg->tx_cnt++;
00458                                 } else {
00459                                         SSP_SendData(SSPx, 0xFFFF);
00460                                         dataCfg->tx_cnt += 2;
00461                                 }
00462                         } else {
00463                                 if (dataword == 0){
00464                                         SSP_SendData(SSPx, (*(uint8_t *)((uint32_t)dataCfg->tx_data + dataCfg->tx_cnt)));
00465                                         dataCfg->tx_cnt++;
00466                                 } else {
00467                                         SSP_SendData(SSPx, (*(uint16_t *)((uint32_t)dataCfg->tx_data + dataCfg->tx_cnt)));
00468                                         dataCfg->tx_cnt += 2;
00469                                 }
00470                         }
00471 
00472                         // Check error
00473                         if ((stat = SSPx->RIS) & SSP_RIS_ROR){
00474                                 // save status and return
00475                                 dataCfg->status = stat | SSP_STAT_ERROR;
00476                                 return (-1);
00477                         }
00478 
00479                         // Check for any data available in RX FIFO
00480                         while ((SSPx->SR & SSP_SR_RNE) && (dataCfg->rx_cnt != dataCfg->length)){
00481                                 // Read data from SSP data
00482                                 tmp = SSP_ReceiveData(SSPx);
00483 
00484                                 // Store data to destination
00485                                 if (dataCfg->rx_data != NULL)
00486                                 {
00487                                         if (dataword == 0){
00488                                                 *(uint8_t *)((uint32_t)dataCfg->rx_data + dataCfg->rx_cnt) = (uint8_t) tmp;
00489                                         } else {
00490                                                 *(uint16_t *)((uint32_t)dataCfg->rx_data + dataCfg->rx_cnt) = (uint16_t) tmp;
00491                                         }
00492                                 }
00493                                 // Increase counter
00494                                 if (dataword == 0){
00495                                         dataCfg->rx_cnt++;
00496                                 } else {
00497                                         dataCfg->rx_cnt += 2;
00498                                 }
00499                         }
00500                 }
00501 
00502                 // If there more data to sent or receive
00503                 if ((dataCfg->rx_cnt != dataCfg->length) || (dataCfg->tx_cnt != dataCfg->length)){
00504                         // Enable all interrupt
00505                         SSPx->IMSC = SSP_IMSC_BITMASK;
00506                 } else {
00507                         // Save status
00508                         dataCfg->status = SSP_STAT_DONE;
00509                 }
00510                 return (0);
00511         }
00512 
00513         return (-1);
00514 }

00516 /*********************************************************************/
00530 FlagStatus SSP_GetStatus(LPC_SSP_TypeDef* SSPx, uint32_t FlagType)
00531 {
00532         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSPx(SSPx));
00533         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSP_STAT(FlagType));
00534 
00535         return ((SSPx->SR & FlagType) ? SET : RESET);
00536 }
00537 
00538 /*********************************************************************/
00554 void SSP_IntConfig(LPC_SSP_TypeDef *SSPx, uint32_t IntType, FunctionalState NewState)
00555 {
00556         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSPx(SSPx));
00557 
00558         if (NewState == ENABLE)
00559         {
00560                 SSPx->IMSC |= IntType;
00561         }
00562         else
00563         {
00564                 SSPx->IMSC &= (~IntType) & SSP_IMSC_BITMASK;
00565         }
00566 }

00586         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSP_INTSTAT_RAW(RawIntType));

00639 void SSP_ClearIntPending(LPC_SSP_TypeDef *SSPx, uint32_t IntType)
00640 {
00641         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSPx(SSPx));
00642         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSP_INTCLR(IntType));

00647 /*********************************************************************/
00661 void SSP_DMACmd(LPC_SSP_TypeDef *SSPx, uint32_t DMAMode, FunctionalState NewState)
00662 {
00663         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSPx(SSPx));
00664         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SSP_DMA(DMAMode));
00665         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
00666 
00667         if (NewState == ENABLE)
00668         {
00669                 SSPx->DMACR |= DMAMode;
00670         }
00671         else
00672         {
00673                 SSPx->DMACR &= (~DMAMode) & SSP_DMA_BITMASK;
00674         }
00675 }
